channel.title: [PI] how can I edit the title on my client and the background?staff command [PI]
channel.description: Hi I've got a pi base and I need to know how to edit the name on the client and also the background please. Also does anyone know the commands for staff on a pi base the server I have dl'ed only goes up to moderator, admin and hidden admin? Thanks

item.title: [PI] how can I edit the title on my client and the background?staff command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ravens, post:7, topic:407756”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=509033.msg3692933#msg3692933 date=1312239809]

this is just common sense, no reason you should need help with this. if you cant do this, don’t make a server.

Your retarded, he’s not making a server he’s leeching it.

OT: Gui.java

now you are too by helping him

Maybe because this is the Server Help section ? Is it not? Just leave.
[/quote]
i think he is capable of pressing ctrl + f himself without your help. but if you want there to be more leeched servers, go ahead.[/quote]
Who cares? They’re not gonna go far.

Read full topic

item.source: [PI] how can I edit the title on my client and the background?staff command [PI]

item.title: [PI] how can I edit the title on my client and the background?staff command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Go into your client.
Find gui.java
Ctrl+f and find the current name of the client and change it to what you want.

For your commands its in the source.
Src>server>Model>Players>Packets>Commands.java

Owner rights should be set to 3.
To make a command only work for you use this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“commandname”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourusernamehere”)) {

Hidden Admin+
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerRights > 4) { //player rights > 4 the 4 is hidden admin

Owner+
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerRights > 3) { //the 3 is for owners

Admin+:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerRights > 2) { // the 2 is for admins

Mod+:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerRights > 1) { // the 1 is for mods

Everyone+
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerRights > 0) { // the 0 is all

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how can I edit the title on my client and the background?staff command [PI]
